response.original_title: Steaming Around Britain: The North West
response.overview: This fascinating programme depicts the history of British Steam in the North West of England focusing on the key railways within the region. So sit back and enjoy a nostalgic journey with a look at both archive and preserved steam plus a brief overview of the role of the railway in the region today.  - West Coast Main Line in the 60s  - Settle and Carlisle in the 60s  - East Lancashire Railway  - Lakeside and Haverthwaite Railway  - Ravenglass and Eskdale Railway  - Isle of Man  - Settle and Carlisle preserved and modern freight
response.tagline: The complete regional guide to steam railways past and present
response.title: Steaming Around Britain: The North West
